projects.title: Cosme Literie
projects.subTitle: Official website of Cosme Literie, a Parisian startup
projects.text: During my second year in engineering school I was able to do a 3-month internship at Cosme Literie, a dynamic startup specialising in the development of natural bedding designed in France. I worked as a front-end developer on the design of the company's new website, which was beginning to be outdated in terms of technology and design.
projects.languages: HTML, SCSS • Bootstrap, Vanilla JS • jQuery, Smarty.
projects.softwares: SourceTree, BitBucket, FileZilla, Sketch for programming and Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop for graphics.

projects.title: Festiv'
projects.subTitle: Creation of a dashboard presenting the festivals in France
projects.text: During a web course during my second year in engineering school, I was able to make a dashboard on festivals in France in collaboration with people from my class. The aim of the project was to retrieve information via an API and to display the data via different graphs, texts or statistics. My role in this project was to create the overall architecture of the project and some of the graphics.
projects.softwares: Git, Github for the programming part and Figma & Adobe Illustrator for the graphics.

projects.title: Kolorz Festival
projects.subTitle: Creation of a web model for Kolorz, a music festival
projects.text: During a web design course during my second year in engineering school, I was able to create a model for a music festival in the south of France. The aim of the project was to develop our skills in UX/UI design and to use new software.

projects.title: Meleohana
projects.subTitle: Creation of a music streaming site
projects.text: During my first year in engineering school, I was able, as part of a back-end development course, to create a music streaming site, Meleohana. In pairs, the goal was to use our skills in back-end development by creating a database and using PHP.

projects.title: Tapitap
projects.subTitle: Official platform of psychologists
projects.text: During my last year in engineering school, I was able to put my skills to good use on a professional project, Tapitap. Tapitap is a test platform for psychologists that allows them to test patients who have lost their licence. Within a team of 9 people, I carried out the whole design of the application and the global architecture of the platform.
projects.softwares: Git, Github, GitKraken, Firebase for the programming part and Figma, Adobe Illustrator for the graphics.

projects.title: Cœur en fusion
projects.subTitle: Creation of a short film
projects.text: During my second year in engineering school, I made a short film in collaboration with 4 people from my class. I took part in the design and reflection phase, the framing and editing. Synopsis : A couple is on a date with their boyfriend. As the date progresses, their attraction grows and the absurdity increases. At the same time, scientists are trying to achieve nuclear fusion until it becomes uncontrollable.

projects.title: CrabAttack
projects.subTitle: Create a tower defense game prototype
projects.text: During my first year in engineering school, I developed a mini-game based on the tower defence system in pairs with a friend. Synopsis: Prevent evil crabs from reaching the beach and pinching holidaymakers.  In all, you must resist 50 waves of killer crabs. To defend yourself, you will have to build palm trees that will throw coconuts.
projects.softwares: Git, Github, GitKraken for the programming part and Adobe Illustrator for the graphics.

projects.title: Disappear
projects.subTitle: Creation of a title sequence
projects.text: During my second year in engineering school, I made a title sequence. The aim of the project was to invent a film and make its credits. In pairs, I did the framing and editing of the video.
projects.softwares: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects.

projects.title: Netflix
projects.subTitle: Creation of a false advertisement in motion design
projects.text: During my first year in engineering school, I made a false advertisement for the Netflix brand. The aim of the project was to use all the skills I learned in Adobe After Effects courses. I chose motion design for its modern look.
